signatures.text: fun String.replaceFirst( oldChar: Char, newChar: Char, ignoreCase: Boolean = false): String
signatures.desc: Returns a new string with the first occurrence of oldChar replaced with newChar.

signatures.text: fun String.replaceFirst( oldValue: String, newValue: String, ignoreCase: Boolean = false): String
signatures.desc: Returns a new string obtained by replacing the first occurrence of the oldValue substring in this string with the specified newValue string.

signatures.text: fun CharSequence.replaceFirst( regex: Regex, replacement: String): String
signatures.desc: Replaces the first occurrence of the given regular expression regex in this char sequence with specified replacement expression.
